attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to debate on youth unemployment on the Fylde coast ie Fleetwood and Blackpool.

if you ignore the youth then the future is bleak.

On the fylde coast we have lost civil service jobs,ICI has downside and Fleetwood fishing industry is basically gone.

Yet nothing seems to be done to bring jobs into these areas,we will soon have a generation of young people without a future.

Which would in the long run effect the government finances and there will be less people to pay tax and national insurance.
